display_name: Hypopnea Index (Supine): hypopneas with >50% airflow reduction and with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or witout arousal / hour of sleep
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events. Hypopneas are defined based on American Academy of Sleep Medicine (AASM) Chicago 1999 standard. [Sleep 1999 (PubMed ID:10450601)]( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/10450601) [All variables consistent with the guideline Chicago 1999] (https://sleepdata.org/search?search=chicago1999)
